Package com.lambdaschool.shoppingcart.services

Interface ProductService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductServiceImpl
public interface ProductService
The Service that works with Product Model.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void delete​(long id)
    Deletes the Product record from the database based off of the provided primary key
    java.util.List<Product> findAll()
    Returns a list of all the Products
    Product findProductById​(long id)
    Returns the Product with the given primary key.
    Product save​(Product product)
    Given a complete Product object, saves that Product object in the database.
    Product update​(long id, Product product)
    Updates the given product

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      java.util.List<Product> findAll()
      Returns a list of all the Products
      Returns:
      List of Products. If no Products, empty list.

    • findProductById

      Product findProductById​(long id)
      Returns the Product with the given primary key.
      Parameters:
      id - The primary key (long) of the Product you seek.
      Returns:
      The given Product or throws an exception if not found.

    • delete

      void delete​(long id)
      Deletes the Product record from the database based off of the provided primary key
      Parameters:
      id - id The primary key (long) of the Product you seek.

    • save

      Product save​(Product product)
      Given a complete Product object, saves that Product object in the database. If a primary key is provided, the record is completely replaced If no primary key is provided, one is automatically generated and the record is added to the database.
      Parameters:
      product - the Product object to be saved
      Returns:
      the saved Product object including any automatically generated fields

    • update

      Product update​(long id, Product product)
      Updates the given product
      Parameters:
      id - The primary key (long) of the product you wish to update
      product - The product object containing the new information - only the product can be updated here, no carts!
      Returns:
      The complete product with the field changes
